Report Contents.Remediation: Remove public access from the bucket IAM policy.

Report Contents.Issue: Compute Engine instance 'terraform-instance' has an unencrypted disk.
Report Contents.Remediation: Encrypt the disk using a customer-managed encryption key (CMEK).

Report Contents.Issue: Kubernetes cluster 'terraform-cluster' is not configured as a private cluster.
Report Contents.Remediation: Configure the cluster to use private nodes to enhance security.
